Action: Test Public Search Interactions
Go to the DOAJ journal search page at /search/journals
Expected Test Results:
* All available records are found, and the first page of 50 results is shown
* Only journals are shown.
* Only facets relevant to journals appear on the left

Action: Change the results per page from 50 to 100 and back again
Expected Test Results: * The number of journals on the page increases and decreases and the number of pages changes

Action: Open and Collapse all the facets on the left
Expected Test Results:
* The facet opens and closes as expected
* Each facet contains a maximum of 40 values relevant to that field

Action: Select one or more values in one facet
Expected Test Results:
* The number of search results changes. You can still select values from other facets
* The values you have selected appear as black lozenges at the top of the search results

Action: Click away the black lozenge(s)
Expected Test Results:
* Search results adjust accordingly
* The value deselects in the left-hand column

Action: Open and Collapse all the new facets on the left
Expected Test Results:
* The facet opens and closes as expected
* Each facet contains all the values for that field in a scrollable list.

Action: Select "Articles" from the Search menu
Expected Test Results:
* All available article records are found, and the first page is shown
* New facets appear on the left, that are relevant only to Articles

Action: Open and Collapse all the new facets on the left
Expected Test Results:
* The facet opens and closes as expected
* Each facet contains all the values for that field in a scrollable list.

Action: Switch back to 'Journals' in the top nav
Open the Journal License Facet
Select one of the CC licenses available
Expected Test Results: * All the results for the selected constraints are found, and the first page is shown

Action: Click "Share | Embed" in the search navigation bar
Expected Test Results: * The search/embed box is shown with a URL and an HTML/JS snippet displayed in each box

Action: Click "shorten url" (Note that this may not work in test, due to configuration requirements, you may receive an error instead)
Expected Test Results:
* The long search url is replaced with a bit.ly url
* "shorten url" is replaced by "original url"

Action: Click "original url"
Expected Test Results:
* The bit.ly url is replaced by the original long search url
* "original url" is replaced by "shorten url"

Action: Close the "Share | Embed" section by clicking the Close button at the bottom of the box, or clicking the "Share | Embed" button again
Expected Test Results: * The share/embed section closes

Action: Go through each sort option in the "sort by" pull-down
In each case, click the "sort by" button to reverse the direction of sort
Expected Test Results: * The current search results are ordered correctly according to the selected sort field and the selected sort direction

Action: Enter a search term in the search box
Expected Test Results:
* All the results for the selected constraints are found, and the first page is shown
* Your search text ramains in the search box

Action: Go through each field constraint under the "search all" pull-down.  You may change your search text if no results are found, to demonstrate that each field works correctly
Expected Test Results:
* If there are search results, the first page is displayed
* If there are no search results, suitable "no results match" text is displayed

Action: Change the number of search results on the page, using the page-size pull-down
Expected Test Results: * The size of the page of results displays increases appropriately

Action: Click the "Next" button to go to the next page of results
Expected Test Results:
* The next page of results is displayed
* The "First" and "Prev" buttons are activated

Action: Click "Next" again
Click "Prev"
Expected Test Results: * You are navigated one page forward and then one page back in the results

Action: Click "First"
Expected Test Results: * You are taken to the first page of the results

Action: Click the black X button to clear all filters
Expected Test Results: * The interface returns to the initial state as per 1.1.1

Action: Test Public Search Results Display: Journals
Go to the DOAJ search page at /search/journals
Under 'See journals' facet on the left, click 'With a DOAJ Seal'
Expected Test Results: * All Journals have the DOAJ Seal displayed in the search results

Action: Clear the "Journal has DOAJ Seal" filter
Expected Test Results: * All Journals are shown

Action: Open the facet "Journal License"
Select any CC licence from this facet
Expected Test Results: * All Journals have the appropriate CC licence displayed in the search results

Action: Clear the "Journal License" CC filter
Select "Publisher's own licence" from that facet
Expected Test Results: * All Journals have the text "Publisher's own license" displayed in the search results

Action: Clear the "Journal License" filter
Check the 'Without APCs or other fees' facet
Expected Test Results: * All Journals have 'No charges' displayed in the search results

Action: Clear the "Article processing charges (APCs)" facet
Find a journals with APCs (Sort on Added to DOAJ (oldest first) to see some)
Expected Test Results: * All journals have 'APCS: amount + currency' displayed in the search results

Action: Look at the first Journal result in your current search results
Click on its title
Expected Test Results: * You are taken to the DOAJ ToC page for this journal

Action: Click back in your browser window so you are back to the search results
Click on the word 'Website'
Expected Test Results: * You are taken to the Journal's home page which opens in a new tab

Action: Test Public Search Results Display: Articles
Go to the DOAJ search page at /search/articles
Expected Test Results: * Only articles are shown in the results

Action: Look at the first article in your search results
Click on the title
Expected Test Results: * You are taken to the DOAJ article page for this article

Action: Click back in your browser window to return to the search results
Click on 'Journal Table of Contents'
Expected Test Results: * You are taken to the DOAJ ToC for the journal which opens in a new tab

Action: Close the tab
Click on "Abstract" where the article has an abstract
Expected Test Results: * The abstract appears beneath the article search results

Action: Click on "Abstract" again
Expected Test Results: * The abstract disappears

Action: Click on "Read online"
Expected Test Results: * You are taken to the full text of this article on the Web. It opens in a new tab
